channel.title: Neighbourhoods on Yet Another Geographer
channel.description: Recent content in Neighbourhoods on Yet Another Geographer

item.description: I find that the hardest part for me to be motivated about is the stage right after I finish the proof of concept. It’s like… once the new stuff is done, I get much less interested than when I’m still trying to figure it out. I guess that’s probably pretty common among researchers, but the thrill of wrestling with a genuinely new problem is interesting, enjoyable, and difficult. Sometimes, it feels like documenting that wrestling is a bit tedious.
